name.ja: <ruby>新<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>世<rt>せ</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby>＝アムリターラ

text.en:
Activate this card only if "Visas Starfrost" is on the field. Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect, and sent to the GY or banished: You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 of them in Defense Position.
● 1 Tuner on the field gains ATK equal to half the ATK of 1 of them.
● Shuffle 1 of them into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card.
● Shuffle this card into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 Field Spell from your GY to your hand.
